param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: uddhidenotifier
param.label: No output
param.description: Does not display anything. Usefull when you want use the notification (popup, floating box) only. You should also hide the module title bar.

param.name: uddshowmsg
param.label: Show messages
param.description: Shows sender name and/or first characters of new message in the module

param.name: uddmanylines
param.label: Lines to display
param.description: Sets how many new messages at most are to be displayed in the module

param.name: uddmaxchars
param.label: Max characters
param.description: Sets how many characters (username + first words of messages) are to be displayed in the module

param.name: uddeenablepopup
param.label: Enable popup
param.description: Enable PMS notification (works currently with uddeIM 0.7 and above only).

param.name: uddeenableajax
param.label: Enable AJAX
param.description: Enable AJAX requests (do only use on small sites)

param.name: uddeajaxtime
param.label: AJAX refresh
param.description: AJAX refresh time in seconds (minimum 5 seconds)

param.name: uddeDHTMLpopup
param.label: Notification type
param.description: By default, DHTML boxes are used.

param.name: uddnametype
param.label: Displayed name
param.description: By default, full realnames are displayed.

param.name: @spacer
param.default: Following parameters for floating box only

param.name: uddrightpos
param.label: End position
param.description: (Floating box only) Ending position of the floating box when sliding right (>0 distance from left window border, <0 distance from right window border).

param.name: uddtimeout
param.label: Display time
param.description: (Floating box only) Display time until box is removed (msec).

param.name: uddrightspeed
param.label: Floating in speed
param.description: (Floating box only) Sliding speed to the right (smaller number means faster movement).

param.name: uddleftspeed
param.label: Floating out speed
param.description: (Floating box only) Sliding speed to the left (smaller number means faster movement).
